Collagraph

Clear design for the web based in Sydney, Australia.

  • info@collagraph.com.au
  • +61 406 566 693

About us

Collagraph is a web design partnership founded by Robert Irish and Luke Bacon.

We design and build websites, develop communications strategies, and help companies and organisations to publish great content.

We’ve worked on successful projects with forward-thinking clients including the Australian Centre for Independent Journalism, Jobs Australia, the Australian National University, Sustainable House and the Australian Council of Social Service.

We’re always excited to take on new challenges, big and small. See some of our work and get in touch about your next project.

Our work

  • Sceptical Climate Report

    We worked with the Australian Centre for Independent Journalism to publish their research into how the Australian media reports on climate science.

    We delivered an accessible online publication with features including interactive data tables and user highlighting, designed to make the research more useful for their target audience.

    View the project →

Christopher L. H. Cooper

Illustrator & designer Christopher L. H. Cooper approached us to help rethink the presentation of his work on the web.

One of the key challenges in this project was to serve high-quality images quickly to users on all types of devices. We delivered a responsive website that conveys Chris's character and displays his work in a clean layout inspired by the strong grids found in broadsheet newspapers.

View the project →

Northbridge Progress Association

The NPA informs and represents local residents of Northbridge, NSW. We helped them redefine the way they deliver information to suit the shifting requirements of their community.

We delivered a responsive website, a full rebranding and a tailored publishing system for local news, community events, resources on key issues in the suburb, their print newspaper and their digital newsletter.

View the project →

Principles for Independent Archives

Principles for Independent Archives is an open-source project we established to share and discuss thoughts on how to build digital archives for the web.

The project is a cross-disciplinary forum for exploring the possibilities of small online archive projects. It has drawn contributions from professional archivists, artists, journalists and web developers.

View the project →
